== Introduction ==
Bardinux is a kubuntu customization focus on university community from University of La Laguna (Spain). It has been developed using unidistro.

== Contact Information ==
** http://bardinux.ull.es
** info@osl.ull.es

== Audience ==
University of La Laguna has about 40000 members shared between students, profesors and other staff. Bardinux is designed to serve them all.

== Mission ==

== Goals ==
** Make free software easy for university people.
** Find software to be used by professors and categorized it by knowledge area.
** Offer support to university community
